meanings.definition: A type of Indian musical instrument.
meanings.sent1: During the concert, the musician played the ambari beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The ambari added a melodious touch to the traditional Indian music.
meanings.sent3: The ambari and the tabla had a friendly musical duel on stage.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the ambari echoed through the auditorium like a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the ambari made it a captivating sight on the stage.

meanings.definition: A type of Indian sweet made from jaggery and rice flour.
meanings.sent1: After dinner, they enjoyed a delicious ambari for dessert.
meanings.sent2: The ambari melted in their mouths, leaving a sweet aftertaste.
meanings.sent3: The children eagerly reached for the last piece of ambari on the plate.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the freshly made ambari filled the kitchen with warmth.
meanings.sent5: Each bite of the ambari brought back memories of childhood festivities.

meanings.definition: A type of Indian dance performed during festivals.
meanings.sent1: The dancers moved gracefully to the rhythm of the ambari.
meanings.sent2: The colorful costumes added to the beauty of the traditional ambari dance.
meanings.sent3: The energetic performance of the ambari dance brought smiles to the audience.
meanings.sent4: The joyous spirit of the festival was captured in the lively steps of the ambari dancers.
meanings.sent5: The beats of the ambari resonated with the festive spirit of the celebration.
